title: Organizing and coordinating community care initiatives
description: Organizing and coordinating community care initiatives
content:
Scenario: Organizing and coordinating community care initiatives
    Given Margaret has organizational skills and community connections
    And community care initiatives need coordination
    When Margaret helps organize mutual aid, care networks, or community programs
    Then the community_elohim should recognize organizational labor
    And it should value coordination work as essential care
    And it should support Margaret in community organizing
    And organizational leadership should accumulate care tokens
    And community should benefit from her coordination skills
    And care infrastructure should be built and maintained
